General.Name: Phoenix Motor Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Phoenix Motor Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, assembles, and integrates electric drive systems, and light and medium duty electric vehicles in the United States and internationally. It provides chargers, electric forklifts, shuttle buses, Type A school buses, utility and service trucks, flatbed and cargo trucks, and walk-in vans. The company offers its products under the Phoenix Motorcars and EdisonFuture brand names. It also engages in the sale and leasing dealership of material handling products including electric lithium-ion forklifts and pallet jacks. It serves medium-duty fleet customers, including utilities, cities, municipalities, transit agencies, airports, hotels, seaports, school districts, parking companies, universities, and corporate campuses. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Anaheim, California.
General.Address: 1500 Lakeview Loop, Anaheim, CA, United States, 92807
